name: Cart

In order to be able to buy items
  As a user of the DemoBlaze website
  I want to be able to add items to my cart or remove them

elements.name: Checkout is successful

steps.name: I have a product in cart
I click the place order button
I fill out every field "Laura", "UK", "Birmingham", "1234567890", "12", "2028"
I click on Purchase
I should receive a pop up confirming my order
the message should include my details, the order ID, amount, and card number
